dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8225 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the treatment of anesthesiologist assistants in the Veterans Health Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cawthorn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the treatment of anesthesiologist assistants in the Veterans Health Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.header: Anesthesiologist assistants in Veterans Health Administration

subsection.text: Section 7401(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting anesthesiologist assistants, after physician assistants,.
Section 7454(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting , anesthesiologist assistants, after Physician assistants.
